page.title: 14DARTMOUTH FUTURE PROJECTS(1)
page.content:
These are two of some of the future projects affecting Dartmouth in 1985.{ { Jawbones,}a hill overlooking Dartmouth is the site for two new rugby pitches and one cricket pitch with practice nets. A pavillion is planned for the future. {
Plans for an{Inner relief road} between Mayors Avenue and Market Square have been approved this year. It was first proposed in 1971 but the starting date for the project is 1990. This road will help preserve some of the ancient buildings in the town centre from the effects of traffic. It was estimated in August 1981 that{2800}cars passed through Duke Street in a 16 hour period. The cost of the scheme is expected to be about{Â£270,000.
